name: SupportTethysAndMarisa
_source: speak;Tethys;Well, when you're carrying a sword, don't you always have it in your left hand?
speak;Marisa;No, I can use either hand...|But my left hand is stronger.
speak;Tethys;So that's like a warning sign.|Left hand equals danger.
speak;Tethys;So why is it you always sleep on your right side?|You know you never roll over in your sleep?|And even the slightest noise causes you to spring up.|Do you ever really sleep?
speak;Marisa;I have to do that.|Otherwise I wouldn't survive.
speak;Marisa;I sleep with my dominant arm up.|That way, if I'm attacked, my good arm is ready to go.
speak;Tethys;Huh...|Do all sword fighters sleep that way?
speak;Marisa;If your dominant arm is cut, you're at a disadvantage in battle.|That means death.
speak;Tethys;But doesn't your arm ever fall asleep?|Aren't there times when you can't use it?
speak;Marisa;No.|My father trained me when I was a child, so that doesn't happen.
speak;Tethys;When you were a child?|How?|Kids always roll around in their sleep.
speak;Marisa;My father placed blunt swords at my sides when I slept to keep me from moving.
speak;Tethys;Your father did that?|But that's so dangerous...
speak;Marisa;No, the blades were rounded and dull.|And it worked.|I don't roll over when sleeping.
speak;Tethys;Wow, sword fighters have some intense training methods, don't they?|I'm glad I was an average kid.|I mean, I was poor, but at least I slept freely.
speak;Tethys;Will wonders never cease?|You actually started a conversation.
speak;Marisa;When you dance, you often begin by putting your right foot forward.

speak;Tethys;Now I'm really amazed.|I can't believe you noticed.|But footwork in dancing has nothing to do with being right- or left-handed.|Dancing is a way of expressing feelings through body movement.|All of one's experiences are incorporated and displayed in the way one dances.
speak;Tethys;That, my dear, is my little secret.|Mine may be a bit unique, though.|My life's taken some odd turns, but it's because of them that I started dancing.|And when I'm dancing, I'm happy.
speak;Marisa;Hmmm.|Your dances give people courage.|Dancing suits you.
speak;Tethys;Doesn't it, though?|All the mercenaries tell me that, too.|Now that you understand my dancing, you're truly a member of Gerik's team.
speak;Tethys;Tell me, Marisa, have you ever thought about wanting to be reborn?
speak;Tethys;You know, coming back as someone else after you die?|If you were going to be reborn, what would you like to be?|Perhaps a beautiful dancer like me?
speak;Marisa;I'm fine with being me.|I can't imagine anything else.

speak;Tethys;I thought that's what you'd say.|Actually, I thought of lots of things, but really can't imagine any other life.|I guess that means that in spite of all the hardships we've faced, we're really happy.

speak;Tethys;Living in this age means that we face many bad things and then worse things.|Yet...|We're alive, so that means we also get good things and then better things, too.|In tough times, I sometimes think I'd like to be reborn in another time, but the important thing is to not give up and to live your life to the fullest.
speak;Marisa;When you die, life is over.|There's no such thing as being reborn.
speak;Marisa;We only get one chance.|So all I can do is keep fighting.
speak;Tethys;After all's said and done, you truly like who and what you are, right?|We have completely different lives, but we have that in common.|That and the same man, right?
speak;Tethys;You can't hide it from me.|I guess I should ask, do you think you're hiding it?
speak;Tethys;What an interesting reaction.|Youth is so cute.
speak;Tethys;Don't be embarrassed.|We're going to be around each other for a long time.|We should talk.
speak;Tethys;There's no need to run away.|We may be rivals, but we're still friends.
